sections.heading: Owner May File List of Securities.
sections.text:
Section 40-24-2

Owner May File List of Securities.

Repealed by Act 99-665, 2nd Sp. Sess., § 9. As to effective date, see the Code Commissioner’s Notes in the code supplement.

(Acts 1935, No. 194, p. 256; Acts 1936-37, Ex. Sess., No. 88, p. 105; Code 1940, T. 51, §366.)
